name: Pushing Daisies
description:
After centuries of escorting people to the back end of life, Death has retired. Farm souls and adventure on your beautiful plot of land by the shore.

I am planning on adding some upgrades before the conclusion of the jam, hopefully giving the player a clear incentive to slaying monsters. This game was created for LowRezJam2020. Let me know what you think about what's already there and what you'd like to see in the future!

**********************************************

WASD to move

E to interact

Q to open inventory

2 / 3 to move inventory cursor

LMB to attack

ESC to pause

**********************************************

If you like the game, make sure to vote here:
https://itch.io/jam/lowrezjam-2020
